price: (Nuko baramwica, maze abamalayika) baramubwira bati “Injira mu Ijuru.” Aravuga ati “Iyaba abantu banjye bamenyaga,
arabic: قِيلَ ٱدۡخُلِ ٱلۡجَنَّةَۖ قَالَ يَٰلَيۡتَ قَوۡمِي يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: qīla ud'khuli al-janata qāla yālayta qawmī yaʿlamūna
